title: Control is back in your hands: NRAI advises restaurants on ONDC
description: The ONDC platform has started by offering prices 30-80% lower to consumers and charging significantly lower commissions from restaurants, compared to established food delivery platforms Swiggy and Zomato. In addition, it provides restaurants access to consumer data which can help them to customise offers and promotions.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
